DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a structured CBT group intervention for women with depression of mild or moderate severity and to pilot a randomized controlled trial to compare this intervention with usual care in socially deprived areas in Bristol, incorporating qualitative methods to assess acceptability.
DOC.brief_title: Group Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Intervention for Women With Mild to Moderate Depression
DOC.criteria: mild to moderate depression antidepressant use is also OK able to speak english abusing drugs or alcohol using secondary mental health services
